title: Pigronata
summaries: Pigronatas are placeable furniture items hung by the player from the underside of blocks, similar to banners. When hit with a weapon, they are destroyed in a shower of confetti, and drop coins and/or other loot. Pigronatas are purchased from the Party Girl during Parties for 1 each.

statistics.Tooltip:
Beat the shindig out of it!
May contain a suprise!
